EmailTemplate.name: NorthAm_Event_Cloud Native Workshop_Missouri_Q415.Follow up - Attended
EmailTemplate.subject: It was great to see you last week
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for attending the Cloud Native Workshop on December 10, 2015. We hope the event met your expectations and the hands-on workshop provided you with new product knowledge.
Next steps:
- Your feedback is important! Please take our short survey <[[https://www.surveymonkey.com/r/9GFTCCH]]> so we continue to make future workshops informative and relevant. - Access to the hands-on labs and technical content is located here <[[https://github.com/cbusch-pivotal/SpringCloudWorkshop]]>.
Contact us <[[mailto:block@pivotal.io]]> to schedule a technical evaluation with our team. Learn how to become Cloud Native today.
Thank you again for joining us. For upcoming events visit us at Pivotal.io <[[http://pivotal.io/news-events]]> and select the events tab. We look forward to seeing you soon!
The Pivotal Team
